name: OMOTON KB036 Wireless Bluetooth Keyboard (Mac Layout, White)
description: Ultra-slim, lightweight white keyboard with smooth soft keys.
longDescription: Experience smooth and silent typing with the OMOTON KB036 Bluetooth Keyboard. Perfect for students, developers, and office use in Pakistan. Enjoy up to 10 meters of stable wireless range, durable scissor-switch keys, and a long-lasting battery. The slim, Mac-style layout includes familiar Command ⌘ and Option ⌥ keys, making it a seamless transition for Apple users, while remaining fully compatible with Windows, macOS, Android, and iOS devices.
